name: Syrup Hosers
description:
Shoot syrup to slow your opponent in this platforming party game centered around controlling space with your syrup. Collect pancakes that appear throughout the stage to win. Direct hits on your opponents, causing them to lose a pancake, but you will need to refill your syrup at a tree. Power-Ups such as soap and beer can give you an advantage over your opponents. Master tactics of movement, aiming, and stage control to defeat your friends.

Controls:

Red Player-

  • WASD To Move
  • Hold and Release F or Q to Fire Syrup in Eight Directions

Blue Player-

  • Arrow Keys To Move
  • Hold and Release Enter or Right Ctrl to Fire Syrup in Eight Directions
